publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Jonah 2
ab.l: Da symarlady יוָ֘י ullu balyḥ jutma Jonany da ėdi Jona ב bavursaḥlarynda ol balyḥnyn üč́ ḱuńĺar da üč́ keč́aĺar.
Da t́efila ėt́ti Jona H-ɣa T́eńrisińa bavursaḥlaryndan ol balyḥnyn.
Da ajtty čaɣyramyn tar bolɣanda maja H-ɣa da qaruv b́ergiń maja qursaɣyndan ǵorńuń jalbardym ėšit́tij avazymny.
Da saldyj ḿeni t́eŕań orun- ɣa ortasyna t́eńgiźĺarniń da öźań quršady ḿeni bar syndyrmaḥlaryj da tolɣunlaryj üśt́uḿa aštylar.
Da ḿeń saɣyš ėt́tim ki śuŕuĺd́um qaršysyndan ʿėnajatlaryjnyn t́ek arttyryrmyn t́efila ėt́ḿa aziź heḫalyjda.
Quršadylar ḿeni suvlar ǯanɣa d́ejiń darja č́uv́ŕa quršadylar ḿeni qamuš č́orǵaĺdi bašyma.

Qyryjlaryna tavlarnyn ėńdim saɣyš ėt́tim ki ol jerniń
b́ekĺav́uč́ĺari bolurlar ḿenim ašyra dunjaɣa d́ejiń da čyɣardy ǵord́ań t irlik- ĺarimni H T́eńrim.
B́uv́ŕajǵańd́a üśt́uḿa ǯanym Adonajny saɣyndym da keĺdi saja t́efilam aziź heḫalyja.
Saqlavčulardan jalɣan h́eč́likĺarni ševaɣat- laryn T́eńriniń h́eč́likḱa kemiš́adirĺar.
Da ḿeń š́uḱurĺuk avaz byla š́uḱur ėt́armiń da d́eb́eḥa ėt́armiń saja ńeki nijet́ ėt́tim any t́oĺarmiń ḱop jarlyɣaš H-ɣa.
Da ajtty H balyḥqa da qu stu Jonany ol quruɣa.

app.note: F305-90: spelled t́erlikĺarimni; a scribal error.
F305-90: spelled quštu; a scribal error.
